mapper.select: select banner_id, product_name, product_url, banner_url from banner;
mapper.insert: insert into banner (banner_id, product_name, product_url, banner_url) values (#{bannerId}, #{productName}, #{productUrl}, #{bannerUrl});

product_name = #{productName},
product_url = #{productUrl},
banner_url = #{bannerUrl},
